item.title: More Hardware Designs on Parallel Processing
item.description: Improving Performance Parallelism Widen the basic word length of the machine 8 bit 16 bit 32 bit 64 bit Vector execution Execute a single instruction on multiple pieces of data Parallel-ise instructions Instruction-level Pipelining Deep Pipeline The depth of the pipeline is increased to achieve higher clock frequencies (more stages).

item.title: Multiprocessors
item.description: Why Increasing CPU frequency helps to increase performance

item.title: Virtual Memory
item.description: Virtual memory is a memory management technique that uses the main memory and disk to create an illusion of very large memory to the user.

item.title: Cache Design
item.description: Cache A hardware component in the processor that is small, but fast!

item.title: Lab 2
item.description: Task 1 Implementation Overview Original SLL BNE Added a bit-shifter and comparator into the ALU.

item.title: Pipelined Processors
item.description: Pipelining involves performing several tasks at relatively the same time.

item.title: Multi Cycle Processors
item.description: The clock cycle speed is originally limited by the longest instruction time.

item.title: Performance
item.description: Performance Metrics Latency response time, execution time, elapsed time

item.title: Single Cycle Processors
item.description: Steps to Build a Processor Analyse instruction set to determine datapath requirements

item.title: Introduction to ISA
item.description: This course uses the MIPS ISA
